About Me

some background...

I am skilled in Javascript, Node.js, Express, Bootstrap, jQuery and React. I particularly enjoy working on the Front-End and creating websites with unexpected API functionality.

CodeCore Vancouver

Developer Bootcamp

12 week, 60 hour/week, full-stack web development bootcamp. Technologies learnt include:

  • Front-End: HTML5, CSS, jQuery, Ajax, Bootstrap, React.js, React Native
  • Back- End: Ruby on Rails, Node.js, Express.js
  • Databases: MySQL, PostgreSQL, ActiveRecord
  • Deployment & Development Tools: Heroku, GitHub

Fall 2018

TD Canada Trust

Financial Services Representative

As a trusted financial advisor, some of my responsibilities included:

  • Managed client's day-to-day banking, investment planning, and home financing needs.
  • Exhibited ability to handle deadlines by setting-up financing by home purchase date

2008 - 2014

HUB Financial

Independent Insurance Broker

I provided unbiased advice to young families with insurance needs, making sure that I:

  • Put the client first by conducting a needs-based analysis for clients wanting life and disability insurance
  • Worked together with providers, clients and external agencies to see an application until completion
